about: I'm buying Surface Laptops almost every year because my sister and girlfriend are borrowing these laptops from me and never return them :D
name: Gevorg Martirosyan

about: This is my third Surface and Im really pleased. The first lasted me 5 years and I loved it.
name: Store Mgr

about: I'm homebound for ~6 months with 2 broken ankles; the sporadic function of the Chromebook.
name: Ryan Pope

about: The camera can be improved. It would also be nice to have another camera on the cover like a Surface Pro.  I really like this extra screen space.
name: Loucardinal

about: I really like the size and style. The keyboard side has this really nice suede-like material that takes the style value up a notch. Really easy to work with.
name: Kim

about: I could be wrong, but it was hard to find a Surface Laptop 4 on short notice and this one seems to have fit the bill
name: Curtis
